unnormalised: Arre yaar, Sharma case vishim aiklay mhunn? IPC section 304, bareabar? Manslaughter. Adv. Verma tankam zhujtat, mhaka dista. Thoddi rahatari tankam mellchi mhunn umed asa, puravo khupuch vaitt asta mhunn aslem tori. Verdict 15/07/2024 porian yetolo mhunn aiklam. Polleun gheium judge kitem sangta mhunn!
normalised: Arre yaar, Sharma case vishim aikullonam? I-P-C section teen she ani char, barein? Manslaughter. Advocate Verma tankam fight kortat, mhunn dista. Tankam thoddo relief mellcho mhunn umed ditam, puravo bara zalam tarih. Pandhra July don hazar ani tevis meren verdict yeunk xakta mhunn aikullam. Judge kitem sangta tem polleun gheuya!
